abstract: Bomb squad destroys pressure cooker left in unattended vehicle near Capitol in Washington, DC; car's owner is arrested, but charges are not detailed.
lead_paragraph: The pressure cooker was found in an unattended vehicle on the National Mall on Sunday, and the vehicle’s owner was arrested, the Capitol Police said.

headline.main: Bomb Squad Destroys Pressure Cooker Near Capitol

snippet: The pressure cooker was found in an unattended vehicle on the National Mall on Sunday, and the vehicle’s owner was arrested, the Capitol Police said.
